hiveArticle.title: A nice location to Visit
hiveArticle.body:
Bangalore is surrounded with nice looking places which you can visit in a day, once such place is near Hindupur. While traveling on the train you can see these locations. It was an evening when the sky is almost blood red.

![IMG_20180502_184223_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWd2fkKdqie3j4fmyisvwC8vCeQ15J3wtRTWQNJWf5CW9/IMG_20180502_184223_2.jpg)

![IMG_20180502_184152_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNnAg1wjVM2488a8o6FoMnsHUJ2wacQutXhqgbC4z77j3/IMG_20180502_184152_2.jpg)

![IMG_20180502_184223_3.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQJ3Hmmmc5usC7FLi4mYc8fGrLzdmRrJSYx6dEfeUrgtx/IMG_20180502_184223_3.jpg)

### Camera : Nokia 6
